definitions.definition: The reaction of a saccharide with a hydroxy or amino functional group to form a glycoside ; especially the reaction with a protein or lipid to form a glycoprotein or glycolipid .

main_definition: ( organic chemistry ) The reaction of a saccharide with a hydroxy or amino functional group to form a glycoside ; especially the reaction with a protein or lipid to form a glycoprotein or glycolipid .
